channel.title: Source error
channel.description:
I get this when I run:
[code] Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx1g Error occurred during initialization of VM Incompatible minimum and maximum heap sizes specified Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
My run.bat:
[code] @echo off title Project Insanity java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause [/code]

item.title: Source error
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I get this when I run:

Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS: -Xmx1g
Error occurred during initialization of VM
Incompatible minimum and maximum heap sizes specified
Press any key to continue . . .

My run.bat:

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server
pause

Read full topic
